lexUnit.name: sweatshirt.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a loose sweater, typically of knitted cotton, worn for exercise or leisure.

sentence.text: She tiptoed past them to the chest of drawers , took out a pair of shorts and a sweatshirt and slipped back downstairs to the kitchen .

He walked rapidly towards the town centre in his shabby patched jeans , his scruffy Canals sweatshirt and his down-atheel shoes , not really thinking about school , or whether someone Important might see him .
